data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Gyor-Moson-Sopron that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gyor-Moson-Sopron, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Gyor-Moson-Sopron.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 371,774 people in the state of Gyor-Moson-Sopron who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Gyor-Moson-Sopron be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Turk people. Make the Turk people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, guide the church in Gyor-Moson-Sopron, Hungary to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Gyor-Moson-Sopron, Hungary a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Gyor-Moson-Sopron, Hungary that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
